bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon w/ RIB Tech, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, aero seat tube, internal cable routing, oversized PIIS BB-86 shell, double water bottle mounts

components.description: D6 high modulus carbon thin seat stays, oversized ETC chainstay, forged alloy dropout w/ replaceable hanger
FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ RIB Tech, tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake combo, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval 330 aero alloy clincher, 30mm rims - 700c, DT Champion spokes, 20/24H, precision ground hubs
Oval 500 forged alloy dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Oval 1 1/8"U - 1 1/2"L integrated w/ alloy top cover
Selle Italia X-1 Lady Flow w/ FeC alloy rails
